name: Acrobator.com
overview:
Acrobator.com is a consultancy company and a venture fund. Acrobator.com assists companies in the sectors of e-commerce, digital media, internet marketing and mobile, offering its clients: — full spectre digital marketing support — e-business strategy development — billing and accounting — management support — on- and offline PR — IT assistance & Web development — talent recruitment — investments

Our mission is to create and expand a consolidated know how force in the digital sector. Acrobator.com consists of a multi-functional e-marketing team, equipped with the ideal proprietary tools and a proven formula to drive acquisition, conversion and retention for its projects and clients.

Acrobator.com uses an innovative formula as its main strategic mantra. C.A.S.H.C.OW. | B.O.M.B.E.R is what any innovative business should use to succeed. It’s a culmination of the world’s best digital marketing tricks: Acrobator.com’s proprietary method is developed and maintained by Bas Godska, who optimized the formula during years of incessant marketeering across multiple continents.

Cashcow consists of seven elements: context (cost per click), affiliate marketing, search engine optimization, human interaction, customer relationship management, optimised usability and web analytics. Bomber stands for: brand, online communities (social media), metasearch (price comparison), banners, email marketing, retargeting.

These two code words make a truly strong interaction of elements, which helps to boost existing businesses and allows to check the strength and feasibility of any startup, from a marketing perspective.

Acrobator.com can offer to qualified startups: superior marketing advice and support, strategic advice, office space, financial and legal resources, clients, international network, expertise, HR recruitment assistance, management support, on- and offline PR and help with basic IT requirements.
